references.text: Tuneable wavelength filters for the 1550nm regime, on the other hand, have -20dB full bandwidths ranging from 5.6nm at 1530nm to 5.0nm at 1562nm (JDS Fitel product specificationTB1500B). Similarly, a tuneable Fabry-Perot etaIon will have a free spectral range of 45nm, finesse of 100 to 150, -3dB bandwidth of 0.45nm, and -20dB full bandwidth of 3.5nm (JDS Fitel product specification TB2500). Thus, except for ultradense WDM systems, the filter bandwidth is the dominant contributor to WDM crosstalk.
